content.question: You will participate in simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Chang Lilan, a reporter for a Chinese newspaper, about your experience studying Chinese. Response 1
